decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing the Reanimator strategy to quickly and efficiently bring powerful creatures back from the graveyard onto the battlefield. By combining cards like Reanimate, Animate Dead, and Entomb with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with big threats early in the game. The deck also includes control elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect its game plan and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The key strategy is to quickly assemble the combo pieces needed to cheat creatures into play and maintain control of the game.

The deck focuses on quickly milling through the library and graveyard manipulation to eventually win the game with Thassa's Oracle or Dread Return. Using cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to mill significant portions of the library, while also utilizing combo pieces like Bridge from Below and Narcomoeba to create a board presence. With the ability to disrupt the opponent with discard spells like Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy, and protect the combo with Pact of Negation, the deck aims to efficiently combo off and win in a single turn.

The main goal of this deck is to assemble the "Cephalid Breakfast" combo, which involves using Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to mill your library, putting Narcomoeba and Thassa's Oracle into play. By controlling the board and disrupting opponents with counterspells like Force of Will and efficient removal like Swords to Plowshares, you aim to set up for a quick win through comboing off. The inclusion of cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Urza's Saga provide additional utility and consistency to help execute the combo efficiently.

The focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Lotus Petal and Grim Monolith to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Glaring Fleshraker. Utilizing cards like Eye of Ugin to search for Eldrazi creatures and Chalice of the Void to disrupt opponents' game plans, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large, hard-hitting creatures while also controlling the board with cards like Sowing Mycospawn and Kozilek's Command. The deck also includes utility lands like Wasteland and Blast Zone to deal with opposing threats.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through countering spells, removing threats, and manipulating the top of the library. It includes cards like Force of Will, Terminus, Swords to Plowshares, and Counterbalance to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Brainstorm and Snapcaster Mage, along with win conditions like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Entreat the Angels. The inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Meticulous Archive helps with card selection and manipulation, providing the player with various options to outmaneuver their opponent.

The deck focuses on utilizing the card Show and Tell to cheat out powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Omniscience onto the battlefield for free. It also includes cards like Cunning Wish and Intuition to search for specific combo pieces, while running a suite of counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce to protect the combo. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with massive creatures and game-ending effects, bypassing traditional mana costs and strategies with its powerful cheating mechanisms.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through the use of lands. By leveraging cards like Wasteland, Sphere of Resistance, and Maze of Ith, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building up its own mana base. It also utilizes cards like Life from the Loam and Crop Rotation to ensure consistency and access to key pieces like The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale or Dark Depths. The deck seeks to outvalue the opponent by generating incremental advantages through land interactions and powerful synergies.

The key strategy of this Doomsday combo deck is to quickly and efficiently filter through the deck using cards like Brainstorm and Ponder to set up a winning combination with Doomsday and Thassa's Oracle. The deck relies on powerful mana acceleration from cards like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual to consistently combo off before the opponent has a chance to react. Thoughtseize and Force of Will provide disruption while Personal Tutor and Street Wraith help to find key combo pieces. The deck aims to win as quickly as possible through a carefully crafted sequence of plays.

The deck focuses on cheating powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier into play quickly through cards like Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. It aims to ramp quickly with cards like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide, while also being able to protect its combo with counterspells like Force of Will and Flusterstorm. The deck aims to outpace and overwhelm the opponent by getting its big threats onto the battlefield before they can respond, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

The primary focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using Cloudpost and Glimmerpost, allowing you to play powerful spells like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Karn, the Great Creator early in the game. Crop Rotation and Once Upon a Time help you search for the key lands you need, while cards like Kozilek's Command and Disruptor Flute offer disruption to your opponent's strategy. With access to powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Planar Nexus, you can overwhelm your opponent with a combination of massive creatures and game-winning abilities.

This deck aims to disrupt the opponent's plans while applying pressure with efficient creatures. By using cards like Swords to Plowshares, Thoughtseize, and Skyclave Apparition to remove threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan, it buys time for aggressive creatures like Barrowgoyf, Solitude, and Overlord of the Balemurk to close out the game quickly. The deck also utilizes cards like Reanimate and Cling to Dust for graveyard interaction and utility. With a mix of disruption and aggression, this Death & Taxes deck aims to outmaneuver opponents and secure victory through smart plays and efficient threats.
